title: riot doesnt care enough about their game
body: so earlier last night i was playing a game and my league completely bugged out i couldn't do anything but see a black screen so i told my friends this and they said it was fine so i tried to fix it but nothing worked it wouldn't even load me in but still riot decided to give me a 20 minute wait for 5 god damn games in case you are not paying enough attention that is 1 hour and 40 minutes spent waiting then you add queue timers which are about 3 minutes i have to wait 1 hour and 55 minutes that's nearly 2 hours and all of this is because my league isn't working, it bug splats, it freezes a lot of stuff happens because riot is to busy making a new legendary skin or buffing the tanks to even give a shit about how the game is working for its player base i get that i wont achieve anything from this and that's fine i just had to release frustration

replies.body:
Oh boy, bugsplats... those can be a real hassle. ><

Fortunately, we do have a guide that can help you figure out what is causing them and fix it. I know you said you tried already, but give [**this guide here**](http://riot.com/1Fa5J8l) a run for it's money and try each of it's steps. Lemme know the results when you're through, and be sure to test the results in game with Customs only. I don't want you netting anymore accidental AFK's, yeah? :J
